==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|金星|金星 (Kinsei)}}
{{wikipedia|Venus (planet)}}
[[File:Venus-real_color.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|金星}}]]
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|きん|せい|yomi=on}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=きんせい}} {{m|ltc|金星|tr=kim seng||metal star; Venus|pos=in reference to {{w|Wu Xing}}}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|きんせい|acc=h|acc_ref=NHK,DJR|y=ko}}

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|proper|きんせい}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=きんせい|astronomy}} [[Venus]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-l|金曜|きんよう}} ''(archaic)''

=====Derived terms=====
* {{ja-l|金星丘|きんせいきゅう|Kinsei kyū}}: {{qualifier|[[palmistry]]}} a [[mount]] of Venus
* {{ja-l|金星草|きんせいそう|Kinsei sō}}: “Venus grass”: alternate name for {{ja-l|栗葉欄|クリハラン|kuriha ran}}, a type of [[fern]] of [[genus]] {{taxlink|Neocheiropteris|genus|noshow=1|ver=161017}}; alternate name for {{ja-l|三手裏星|ミツデウラボシ|mitsude uraboshi}}, a type of fern of genus {{taxlink|Selliguea|genus|noshow=1|ver=161017}}

=====See also=====
* {{list:planets of the Solar System/ja|sort=きんせい}}
* {{ja-l|ビーナス|Bīnasu}}: Venus, the [[Roman]] [[goddess]]

===Etymology 2===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|金星 (相撲)|金星 (Kinboshi)}}
{{wikipedia|Kinboshi}}
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|きん|ほし|k2=ぼし|yomi=j|r=y}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=きんぼし|金|tr1=kin|t1=gold|星|tr2=hoshi|t2=star}}. {{rendaku2|sort=きんぼし|hoshi|boshi}}

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|きんぼし|acc=a|acc_ref=NHK,DJR|y=j}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|きんぼし}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=きんぼし|sumo}} a [[win]] by a ''[[力士#Japanese|rikishi]]'' of the lower ''[[前頭#Japanese|maegashira]]'' rank over a ''[[横綱#Japanese|yokozuna]]''
# {{lb|ja|sort=きんぼし|sumo}} a gold star mark displayed on the name and [[ranking]] [[board]] at a sumo competition indicating such a win
# {{lb|ja|sort=きんぼし|metaphor}} a great [[deed]]

=====See also=====
* {{ja-l|銀星|きんぼし|ginboshi}}: {{qualifier|sumo}} a win by a ''[[力士#Japanese|rikishi]]'' of the lower ''[[前頭#Japanese|maegashira]]'' rank over an ''[[大関#Japanese|ōzeki]]''; a [[silver]] [[star]]
